description:
With this Badge you endorse nature.

Just hit Participate, that's it, no worries, I think, hahaha!

But seriously: *This round has 111 Badges, when they are all given away a new round starts with a new AYA Nature Badge. If you collect many Badges, you may get something special along the line.. I think you will like it. More hints will follow..

Twitter helps to stay updated. https://twitter.com/AYANatureNews
But if you donâ€™t like that, set a reminder to check our Soonaverse space every week (Perhaps bookmark/save this page).

Infinite love,
AYA Nature
name: ~Celebrate Nature Badge~
